name: Innovation
description: The uniqueness and originality of the startup's idea or product.

name: Market Potential
description: The size and growth potential of the target market.

name: Team Expertise
description: The skills and experience of the founding team.

name: Execution Plan
description: The well-defined strategy and plan for bringing the idea to market.

name: Financial Viability
description: The ability of the startup to generate revenue and achieve profitability.

name: Technology Readiness
description: The level of development and readiness of the technology or solution.

name: Market Fit
description: How well the product or service aligns with the needs and preferences of the target market.

name: Customer Acquisition Strategy
description: The plan for acquiring and retaining customers in a cost-effective manner.

name: Scalability
description: The ability of the business to scale operations efficiently as demand increases.

name: Competitive Landscape
description: An analysis of competitors and the startup's unique positioning in the market.

name: Regulatory Compliance
description: Adherence to relevant laws and regulations in the industry or market.

name: Customer Feedback
description: Feedback from early customers regarding the product or service experience.

name: Strategic Partnerships
description: Collaborations and partnerships that can enhance the startup's growth and capabilities.

name: Risks and Mitigations
description: Identification of potential risks and a plan for mitigating them.

name: Sustainability Practices
description: Incorporation of environmentally and socially sustainable practices in the business model.
